fullplot: A cartoonist who had an affair with a girl who is murdered gets himself embroiled in a high-level cover-up of a sex scandal involving his lover. By using his artistic talent to try and reconstruct the scandal, he attracts attention to himself by the people involved, and becomes a target himself.
plot: An artist, framed for the murder of a woman, is drawn into a web of corruption, blackmail and deceit.
title: Slam Dance
